misc: The phenomenon called 'Okkotoberfest' was named after his alcohol-induced condition in a past Hector event
biography: Okko, a familiar face at the Hector Trophée representing Hirsala Golf, is set to make his fifth appearance in the upcoming edition. With a single Hector Trophée victory under his belt, Okko is known for his strategic play and calm demeanor on the course.

However, beneath his collected exterior lies a golfer with a history of back problems, requiring meticulous pre-round routines. Despite these physical challenges, Okko's resilience and determination have made him a formidable competitor.

Off the course, Okko is known for his jovial spirit, which once led to the coining of the term 'Okkotoberfest' to describe his celebratory state at a past Hector event. This blend of competitive drive and good-naturedness makes Okko a beloved figure among players and spectators alike.
